thread.title: Fiona Redmond

author: Fiona Redmond
title: Fiona Redmond
text: I ordered samples to determine the right colour. They were perfect for selection and style. The blind came exactly as I ordered for a very big window. The blind arrived safely and on time. Was fitted with extreme ease and is perfect for our bedroom. Have used Blinds 2 Go on numerous occasions and can't fault the service or product or price. Would definitely recommend them
